description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 58 (Water Connection) of planning permission 2019/2514 (as amended by 2021/2295, 2022/2875 and 2024/0404).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Condition 35 of 2019/2514 states:&nbsp;</span><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Water&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The development hereby approved shall not be occupied until confirmation has been provided in writing that either:-</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">(i) All water network upgrades required to accommodate the additional flows from the development have been completed; or</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">(ii) A housing and infrastructure phasing plan has been agreed with Thames Water to allow additional properties to be occupied.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Where a housing and infrastructure phasing plan is agreed no occupation shall take place other than in accordance with the agreed housing and infrastructure phasing plan.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: network reinforcement works are likely to be required to accommodate the proposed development; any reinforcement works identified will be necessary in order to avoid flooding and/or potential pollution incidents.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The submitted details have been reviewed by Thames Water who have no adverse comments to make about the proposed details. The submitted details satisfy the requirements of condition 58 of 2019/2514, and Thames Water consider the submitted documents demonstrate that the required works have been undertaken, and the condition can be considered to have been discharged. The following details are considered suitable for approval: </span></p><div><ul><li>Letter from Thames Water (Ref DS6093702 - Woodberry Down Phase 3 'Our Clean Water Network Has Capacity') , dated 29th Nov 2022&nbsp;</li><li>Email from Thames Water (Ref DS6115635 - Woodberry Down Phase 3 'S106 Connection Application') dated 23rd April 2024</li><li>Letter from Thames Water (Ref DS6115635 - Woodberry Down Phase 3 'Notice of consent to indirectly connect&nbsp;to a public sewer) dated 23rd April 2024</li></ul></div><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Please note, Condition 58 for phase 3 only can be discharged as long as the water supply is taken from the 180mm HPPE main at the junction of Seven Sisters Rd and Woodberry Grove.</span><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Conclusion</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-f8c70b9a-7fff-962a-52b4-9d77c2ae6f0d"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The submitted details are sufficient to approve the application.</span></p>
